trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around December 14th 2007
Summary: Large blue round light decending to the groung on southern sky within south Sacramento County.
divs: sighting detailslarge blue round light decending to the groung on southern sky within south sacramento county. standing on back porch looking at sky after four nights of seeing large white light hovering and slowly moving 2 - 3 degrees left and right then going streight up; when we observed one large blue round 'light' decend to the ground from the sky. the area of decent would place the object or light in southern sacrament county between mack road and possibly galt. very large light\object not moving like a meteor as the decent was much slower and no 'trail' coming from the rear. we noticed the 'light' because it seemed to come out of nowhere on a quiet night with no other activiy observed. our reaction was one of shock due to the suddeness of it's appearance. there was no sound associated with the object\light. we lost sight of the object once it passed into the line of trees at ground level.
